app.refreshPrompt: Please refresh the page in time to update to avoid affecting usage

crud.batchActionConfirm: Are you sure you want to execute {action}?
crud.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?
crud.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone, please proceed with caution
crud.warnBatchDeleteRequestDeleteByRecords: When actions includes batch_delete, requestDeleteByRecords is required
crud.warnCreateDetailForm: When actions includes create, detailForm is required
crud.warnCreateRequestCreateByValues: When actions includes create, requestCreateByValues is required
crud.warnDeleteProps: When actions includes delete, deleteProps and requestDeleteByRecord are required
crud.warnReadDetailForm: When actions includes read, detailForm is required
crud.warnReadRequestGetByRecord: When actions includes read, requestGetByRecord is required
crud.warnUpdateDetailForm: When actions includes update, detailForm is required
crud.warnUpdateRequest: When actions includes update, requestGetByRecord and requestUpdateByValues are required

crudOfList.warnAtLeastOneSearch: At least one column with search set to true is required in CRUDOfList columns
crudOfList.warnOnlyOneSearch: Only one column with search set to true is allowed in CRUDOfList columns

upload.dragUpload: Click or drag files to this area to upload
upload.maxFilesWarning: You can upload at most {count} files, the excess will be ignored.
